TopicTitle: Is Tylo the douchebag of the Jool system?

Articles.Content: Maybe I just suck at orbital planning, but whenever I try to approach or orbit around Jool with glorious visions of cool landings, Tylo will always show up, say "NOPE!" and either eject me from the system or make my orbit turn polar.
lolz I wouldn't quite put it like that.. but it does have a soi far larger then I was expecting to see

I've only ever had to burn a little bit in one direction or another, preferably when you're about 5x further than the orbit of Bop or some distance similarly great, to bypass Tylo and perform direct Laythe or Jool aerocapture.
